resources.string: give your note a title here

hellow user.\n this beautiful app is created by team(naveen yadav,kumar satu,nakul ,ramanand)for taking notes from any where anytime .here you can save notes and ascess these from any whera . sync notes to save these in your gmail account .
download a beautiful note taking app from google playstore name Take Notes . here you can save your notes to google gmail account and ascess these notes from anywhere
